short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design your own automation workflows. Effortlessly record and replay web actions using our intuitive web app and browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
- Record user actions to automatically generate automation workflows
- Execute automations directly in the browserctchr
- Automatically extract key data, such as selectors, for seamless integration and precise control over web elements in your automation workflows
